      • activeForFile

        boolean activeForFile(PsiFile source)
        Parameters:
        source - the source file with code
        Returns:
        true, if external processor selected as active (enabled) for the source file

      • format

        TextRange format(PsiFile source,
                 TextRange range,
                 boolean canChangeWhiteSpacesOnly,
                 boolean keepLineBreaks)
        Formats the range in a source file.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file with code
        range - the range for formatting
        canChangeWhiteSpacesOnly - procedure can change only whitespaces
        Returns:
        the range after formatting or null, if external format procedure cannot be applied to the source

        Returns:
        the indentation String or null if nothing to be changed

        source - the source file with code
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        source - the source file with code
        range - the range for formatting
        canChangeWhiteSpacesOnly - procedure can change only whitespaces
